subtitle: This recipe allows 2 pancakes per person.

method.text: In a large bowl, mix together the flours and salt.
Mix the buttermilk with the egg yolks. Stir into the flour and beat until smooth.
Whisk the egg whites in a clean, dry bowl until stiff but not dry. Carefully fold into the batter mixture.

Heat a little of the oil in a large frying pan. Drop 3 large spoonfuls of the mixture into the pan, spread into rounds and cook for about 1 min on each side or until lightly browned. Remove from pan and keep warm while repeating with the remainder.
Peel, stone and slice the avocado. Toss in the lemon juice to help prevent discoloration. Shake off any excess liquid. Cut the grilled bacon into small pieces.
Top the pancakes with the soured cream. Scatter the bacon over the pancakes with the avocado. Sprinkle with pepper, garnish with chervil and serve immediately.
